The Man and the 
 Lion 
 
 Mozambican folktale 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Once upon a time, there 
 
 was a man walking in the 
 
 bush. 
 
 
 
 Sudenly he met a Lion! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Lion was resting in the 
 
 short winter gras. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The meting was so 
 
 suden that the man 
 
 did not know what to 
 
 do. 
 
 
 
 He was ful of fear. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 At first, the Lion was 
 
 surprised to, and a 
 
 litle afraid. 
 
 
 
 But there was a low rumble 
 
 in his stomach, because he 
 
 was hungry. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The man sudenly 
 
 found himself up a tal 
 
 tre. 
 
 
 
 He began to shout at the 
 
 Lion. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Lion lay down 
 
 under the tre, waiting 
 
 for his meal. 
 
 
 
 As time went on, the Lion 
 
 fel aslep, or so it 
 
 semed. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Son the man fel aslep. 
 
 Then he woke up again. 
 
 Finaly he dozed of and 
 
 went fast aslep. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But then he crashed 
 
 down on the sleping Lion! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 They both woke up 
 
 confused and frightened. 
 
 
 
 The lion forgot his meal 
 
 and ran for his life. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The man began to run 
 
 in the same direction 
 
 as the Lion. 
 
 
 
 Then he realized that he 
 
 was runing with the Lion! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 So he changed direction 
 
 and escaped being eaten 
 
 by the Lion!
